title: Monster Music
subtle: Humorous (fiction), 218 words, Level I (Grade 1), Lexile 460L, Fiction Series
description: Jupe and Lurk love to sing and play music together on Jupe's toy piano. When they start singing and playing in a real piano store, the owner is pleased to see that their music is helping to sell pianos. In the end, the monsters earn a very special reward. Pictures support the text.
